title: Data Preservation and Destruction
itunes:title: Data Preservation and Destruction
description:
It's hard to hold onto information. Paradoxically, it can also be hard to get rid of it. In this episode, we look at why long-term data preservation is a challenge, and the lengths people will go to in order to clear out digital information.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:keywords: data, data storage, delete, overwrite, cassette, CD, compact disc, hard disk, HDD, hard disk drive, SSD, solid state drive, floppy disk, digital information, hieroglyphs, Rosetta Stone, nuclear waste
